name: Shadowsilk Sleeves
data: It increases the users dexterity incredibly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hiding'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'doublehit'.
The sleeves are tipped with gnarled spinnerets that can 'enmesh'
